channel.title: Purdue University (R-087)

item.title: Responds to G Pollack rept re conversion from high to low enriched fuel at univ research reactors.Univ has neither funds nor manpower for conversion.Misconceptions in rept re univ research reactors addressed.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: PURDUE UNIV., WEST LAFAYETTE, IN

item.title: Insp repts 50-182/94-01 & 70-0152/94-01 on 941121-23 & 950109.No violations noted.Major areas inspected: organization logs/records,review & audits,surveillances & emergency planning.
item.description: INSPECTION REPORT, NRC-GENERATED, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION III)
